Subject: There shall be no mercy.....

::Punch/Dark One/Pyro::

Punch smiles pleasently at Iron Raptor as she accuses him of mostrocity. "Of 
course, me dear. Your friend will soon hope she had never left the Ark in the 
first place."

He frowns as Iron Raptor started struggling, Dark One obvioustly having 
trouble keeping her in his grasp. Dark One was tilting his head back, trying 
to avoid Iron Raptor's jaws. Punch growls.

"Enough!" he says, walking over to Pyro, who was holding Tavatron, "You will 
stop struggling now, or your friend will die before she has the opportunity 
for a good scream or two," he lowers his gun to press against Tavatron's 
neck, ready to pull the trigger.

As Punch was saying this, Dark One lifts his rifle, slamming it down as hard 
as he could at Iron Raptor's head.
